name: Airport Geek
description:
AirportGeek is a quiz game that tests your knowledge of IATA airport codes. You'll be given the name of an airport, just provide the correct three letter code to earn points, game credits and extra time. Lose a credit with each wrong answer. The game ends when you run out of credits or run out of time.

• AirportGeek becomes more challenging as you play
• Fun for pilots, frequent flyers, airline crew members, airplane fans, air travelers, aviation enthusiasts
• More than 370 Primary U.S. Airports with regular scheduled passenger service
• Share your score on Game Center, Facebook and Twitter

Learn more: http://www.airportgeek.com
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/airportgeekapp
